message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Thank you for the offer, Alice, but $180 is a bit too high for me. I'd be happy to pay $120 for this product.
I understand that $180 is a bit steep for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. How about we meet in the middle at $160?
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, Alice, but $160 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable paying.  I'm willing to go up to $135. If that doesn't work for you, I'll have to go with John's offer.
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $140, but I'm not going to go any lower than that. This is my final offer, so think carefully!
